mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_role (role_id, role_type, role_name, rolems, lrrq, yxbz) values (#{roleId},#{roleType},#{roleName},#{rolems},sysdate,'Y')
mapper.update:
update t_sys_role t
t.role_type = #{roleType},
t.role_name = #{roleName},
t.rolems = #{rolems},
where t.role_id=#{roleId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_menu_role(uuid, role_id, menu_id) values (#{uuid},#{roleId},#{menuId})
mapper.select: select m.menu_id as code,m.menu_name as caption from t_sys_menu m where m.menu_id in ( select menu_id from t_sys_menu_role where role_id= #{roleId} )
